catentdesc.name: Bedroom Computer
catentdesc.shortdescription: A lightweight computer suited to handle everyday tasks.
catentdesc.longdescription: This home computer is perfect for using everyday, whether it be for checking e mails, or browsing the Internet. Use this computer to work on all your important documents, and share photos with your family.

catentdesc.name: Office Computer
catentdesc.shortdescription: The perfect workstation for the home office.
catentdesc.longdescription: This home and office computer is ideal for creating and working with all your important documents. You can work on everything your personal or business needs might require. Your home office has never been more efficient!

catentdesc.name: Gaming Computer
catentdesc.shortdescription: A powerful computer capable of handling the latest games.
catentdesc.longdescription: This gaming computer is the real deal for anyone looking for raw gaming power. With tons of memory and hard drive space, and the latest and greatest video card, this computer can handle anything you throw at it.

catentdesc.name: Multimedia Computer
catentdesc.shortdescription: A powerful multimedia computer for creating videos, music, and pictures.
catentdesc.longdescription: This multimedia computer is perfect to let your ideas come to life. Whether you are making videos, music, or editing pictures, there are no bottlenecks. Let your imagination run wild!
